node.title: Jimmy Kimmel: Biden Is Steady but Slow, Like ‘Grandpa at the Wheel’
node.alt: Kimmel argued that Biden’s low rating came before the infrastructure bill was passed: “And if anything can get the American people fired up, it’s infrastructure.”
node.description: “He’ll get us there, it’ll just happen very slowly with the blinker on the whole ride,” Kimmel joked of the president and his 38 percent approval rating.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "A new poll found President Biden\u2019s approval rating is at 38 percent.", "\u201cThat was before Congress passed the infrastructure bill, though,\u201d Jimmy Kimmel said on Tuesday night. \u201cAnd if anything can get the American people fired up, it\u2019s infrastructure.\u201d", "Stephen Colbert auditioned Paul Rudd for People\u2019s \u201cSexiest Man Alive\u201d on Tuesday\u2019s \u201cLate Show.\u201d", "Will Ferrell returns to \u201cThe Tonight Show\u201d on Wednesday night.", "Courtney Barnett\u2019s third album is a study of both the simple certainties of life and the big thing that comes after."]
